latest_articles.title: Eating Kosher in the Heart of Syria: Lamb-Stuffed Zucchini but Hold the Yogurt
latest_articles.summary: In the post-Assad era, more Jews are visiting a country that some fled decades ago. One hotel restaurant offers a corner where religious dietary requirements are melded with the local cuisine.

latest_articles.title: Saudis Announce New Investments in Syria, a Sign of Deepening Ties
latest_articles.summary: Saudi and Syrian officials announced deals ranging from aviation to telecommunications, offering a much-needed boost to Syria’s battered economy.
latest_articles.evidence: New Investments in Syria, a Sign of Deepening Ties

latest_articles.title: Chevron Agrees to Explore Oil and Gas Work in Syria
latest_articles.summary: Chevron has signed an initial agreement to start working in Syria, weeks after the Syrian government seized control of key oil and gas fields in the north of the country.
latest_articles.evidence: Chevron Agrees to Explore Oil and Gas Work in Syria

latest_articles.title: Syrian Government and Kurdish-Led Militia Seal a Deal to Merge Forces
latest_articles.summary: The long-anticipated agreement closes a period of intense uncertainty in northeastern Syria after rebel forces led by Ahmed al-Sharaa, who is now the president, seized power in December 2024.

latest_articles.title: Syria's defiant Kurds vow to 'fight until last breath' despite government push
latest_articles.summary: The US fought IS with the Kurds for years. Now, Donald Trump is siding with Syria's new leader.

latest_articles.title: Putin, Still Harboring Assad, Welcomes New Syrian Leader to Moscow Again
latest_articles.summary: This is the second time that President Vladimir V. Putin has hosted President Ahmed al-Sharaa since the fall of the Russia-backed Syrian dictator Bashar al-Assad.
